name: SKYBLOOD
description:
Locked the enemy! And fire!

SkyBlood is an aiming "table" FPS game.
This game was made with the PICO-8 and is a prototype result.

Aim the battle-type robot that moves left and right to attack enemies.
And kill the enemy in 60 seconds.

Controls (Gameplay)

Arrow keys: aim movement
Z Key (O) : Fire !
X Key (X) : Aim at the enemy (Beware of taking damage!!)
